name: perfectly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B1 in a perfect way: The jacket fits perfectly, the skirt not so well. They're perfectly suited.
B2 used to emphasize the word that follows: To be perfectly honest, I don't care any more. You know perfectly well what the matter is. I made it perfectly clear to him what I meant. I was perfectly happy on my own.
More examplesFewer examplesWith her qualifications, she should fit the job perfectly.Those two lines of poetry express perfectly the profound sadness of loss.There's no need to shout, I can hear perfectly well.The earth is not perfectly spherical.She sat perfectly still while I took her photograph.
